title: Blockchain Audit Log System
description: Implement immutable, tamper-proof audit logging using blockchain technology. Track all cryptographic operations with verifiable integrity for compliance and forensics.

title: Implement mlock for sensitive data
description: Use mlock()/VirtualLock() to prevent memory swapping. Lock keys, passwords, plaintext in RAM. Handle mlock limits and failures gracefully.

title: Add AMD SEV support
description: Implement AMD Secure Encrypted Virtualization support. Enable VM-level isolation. Support SEV-SNP attestation. Protect keys in virtualized environments.

title: Add emergency header backup
description: Backup/restore volume headers for recovery

title: Add multi-threaded chunk processing
description: Implement parallel chunk encryption/decryption

title: Add resumable operations
description: Support pausing and resuming large file operations

title: Implement audit logging
description: Comprehensive logging of all encryption operations

title: Add Intel SGX secure enclave support
description: Implement Intel SGX integration for isolated crypto operations. Create enclave for key operations. Add remote attestation. Protect keys from OS-level attacks.

title: Select lightweight blockchain framework
description: Evaluate Substrate, Tendermint, custom implementation. Prioritize lightweight, embedded-friendly solutions. Assess storage and performance requirements.

title: Design PQC volume header format
description: Extend volume header format to support PQC keys and signatures. Include algorithm identifiers, public keys, and signature fields. Maintain backward compatibility with V3 format.

title: Add file associations
description: Register .scrypt file extension handler

title: Phase 2: Large File Support (Streaming)
description: Implement chunked encryption for files of any size with progress tracking

title: Convert Windows-specific features to cross-platform
description: Windows Registry integration (winreg) for file associations is currently Windows-only. Need to implement cross-platform file association registration for Linux and macOS.

title: Research bootloader technologies
description: Study GRUB, UEFI, custom bootloaders for pre-boot auth

title: Create peer-to-peer file sharing
description: Implement P2P encrypted file transfer. Support NAT traversal (STUN/TURN). Add peer discovery and authentication. Use libp2p or custom protocol.

title: Compile crypto core to WASM
description: Compile AES-GCM, Argon2id, streaming encryption to WASM. Ensure no_std compatibility. Handle memory management in WASM environment.

title: Evaluate GUI framework options
description: Compare Tauri, egui, Iced - select best for project

title: Implement volume header format
description: Design and implement encrypted volume header with metadata: version, cipher info, IV, salt, volume size, sector size, creation date

title: Design pre-boot auth environment
description: Minimal UI for password entry before OS loads

title: Implement secure deletion (DoD 5220.22-M)
description: Multi-pass secure file deletion. Support DoD 5220.22-M (7-pass), Gutmann (35-pass), custom patterns. Verify deletion completeness.

title: Create cross-platform FS abstraction
description: Implement EncryptedFilesystem trait that abstracts over platform-specific FUSE/WinFsp implementations with common interface

title: Add HE performance optimizations
description: Optimize HE operations with batching and parallelization. Implement hardware acceleration for HE. Add caching for encrypted operations.

title: Implement browser-based decryption
description: Enable client-side file decryption in browser. Support File API and Blob handling. Add progress callbacks for large files.

title: Add CLI commands for volumes
description: Add CLI commands: volume create, volume mount, volume unmount, volume list, volume info, volume change-password

title: Implement container creation
description: Create encrypted container files with filesystem

title: Phase 4: Whole Drive Encryption
description: Implement encrypted container volumes with FUSE/Dokany

title: Create encrypted search index
description: Build encrypted inverted index for file contents. Support keyword searches without decryption. Implement privacy-preserving query protocols.

title: Add context menu integration
description: Right-click encrypt/decrypt in file explorer

title: Add SSD wear-leveling awareness
description: Detect SSD storage and adjust secure deletion. Account for wear-leveling that moves data. Use TRIM/UNMAP commands appropriately. Add NVMe secure erase support.

title: Develop kernel driver (Windows)
description: Filter driver for transparent disk encryption

title: Implement Phase 5a: Post-boot system encryption
description: Encrypt system partition after OS loads (safer approach)

title: Create hybrid classical+PQC encryption mode
description: Implement hybrid encryption combining AES-256-GCM with Kyber KEM. Ensures security even if PQC algorithms are broken. Add configuration option for hybrid vs PQC-only mode.

title: Create secure heap allocator
description: Build custom secure allocator combining all memory protections. Use as global allocator option. Benchmark performance overhead.

title: Research FUSE/Dokany/WinFsp options
description: Evaluate userspace filesystem libraries for each platform

title: Implement volume auto-mount
description: Add auto-mount on startup, save preferred mount points, handle mount failures gracefully, background mounting

title: Optimize WASM bundle size
description: Minimize WASM binary size with wasm-opt. Use feature flags to exclude unused crypto. Benchmark bundle size vs performance trade-offs.

title: Phase 1: Architectural Refactoring
description: Refactor monolithic main.rs into modular, extensible architecture with proper testing

title: Implement smart card PIV support
description: Add PIV (Personal Identity Verification) smart card support. Implement PKCS#11 interface. Support certificate-based authentication and key storage.

title: Transform Secure Cryptor into Professional Encryption Suite
description: Main epic for transforming the CLI tool into a full-featured encryption product with GUI, large file support, drive encryption, and boot-time encryption

title: Add TRIM command coordination
description: Coordinate TRIM/DISCARD commands with secure deletion. Ensure SSD firmware properly erases cells. Detect and warn about untrimmed SSDs.

title: Research Rust formal verification tools
description: Evaluate Prusti (ETH Zurich), Kani (Amazon), Creusot (Inria). Compare capabilities, maturity, and suitability for crypto verification. Document tool selection.

title: Design encrypted container format
description: Define container header, master key storage, volume encryption

title: Set up WASM build pipeline
description: Configure wasm-pack and wasm-bindgen. Set up cross-compilation for wasm32-unknown-unknown. Add WASM build to CI/CD pipeline.

title: Create HSM abstraction layer
description: Design unified HSM interface abstracting YubiKey, TPM, SGX, smart cards. Provide consistent API for key operations. Support multiple HSM backends simultaneously.

title: Create REST API for automation
description: Programmatic access for enterprise workflows

title: Add WASM security hardening
description: Implement Content Security Policy for WASM. Add WASM integrity checking. Protect against side-channel attacks in browser environment.

title: Add hardware crypto acceleration detection
description: Detect and use AES-NI, AVX2, SHA extensions. Add Intel QuickAssist Technology (QAT) support. Benchmark hardware vs software crypto performance.

title: Design streaming encryption architecture
description: Design chunk-based encryption with unique nonces per chunk

title: Implement volume key derivation
description: Add key derivation for volumes using Argon2id, support for multiple key slots (multi-user), and secure key storage in memory

title: Implement secure key storage
description: Store decryption keys securely in TPM or derive from password

title: Create audit log viewer GUI
description: Build graphical audit log viewer. Support filtering, searching, timeline view. Export audit reports to PDF/CSV. Add compliance templates (HIPAA, SOC2).

title: Implement theming support
description: Light/dark mode and custom themes

title: Formal Verification of Cryptographic Core
description: Mathematically verify security properties of crypto implementations using formal verification tools (Prusti, Kani, Creusot). Generate machine-checked proofs for correctness and security.

title: Verify nonce construction
description: Verify NIST SP 800-38D compliant nonce construction for streaming encryption. Prove: no nonce reuse, proper chunk counter increment, bounds checking.

title: Verify refactored code works
description: Run all tests, ensure binary compiles and functions correctly

title: Phase 6: Enterprise Features
description: Key management, policy enforcement, and enterprise integration

title: Add CI verification checks
description: Integrate verification into CI/CD pipeline. Run proofs on every commit. Fail builds if verification fails. Add verification status badges.

title: Create encrypted memory pool
description: Implement custom allocator with encryption at rest. Use lightweight cipher (ChaCha20) for RAM encryption. Support different security levels per allocation.

title: Add WebDAV frontend
description: Implement WebDAV server for encrypted volumes. Support mounting as network drive. Add authentication and access control. Cross-platform client support.

title: Fix Tauri dialog permission error
description: Add window label to tauri.conf.json to match capability definition

title: Implement backup header functionality
description: Write write_backup_header() that duplicates metadata to volume_size - HEADER_AREA_SIZE. Add read_backup_header() for recovery. Verify both headers match on volume open.

title: Set up Tauri project structure
description: Initialize Tauri with React/Svelte frontend

title: Create storage module
description: Implement StorageBackend trait for file I/O operations

title: Add progress reporting trait
description: Define ProgressReporter trait for UI feedback

title: Verify AES-GCM implementation
description: Formally verify AES-GCM encryption/decryption correctness. Prove: decryption inverts encryption, tag verification prevents tampering, no key leakage.

title: Implement memory scrubbing
description: Securely zero memory on deallocation. Use volatile writes resistant to compiler optimization. Extend existing zeroize integration.

title: Design file format v2
description: Create new file format supporting chunked encryption with metadata

title: Add system tray integration
description: Tray icon with quick actions and status

title: Create JavaScript bindings
description: Generate TypeScript definitions with wasm-bindgen. Create ergonomic JS API for encryption/decryption. Handle Promise-based async operations.

title: Memory Encryption & Protection Suite
description: Protect sensitive data in RAM using encrypted memory pools, mlock(), guard pages, memory scrubbing, debugger detection, and Intel TME support.

title: Implement policy enforcement engine
description: Mandatory encryption rules and compliance checking

title: Write formal specifications for crypto primitives
description: Define formal properties for AES-GCM, Argon2id, XTS-AES. Specify pre/post-conditions, invariants, and security properties. Use tool-specific annotation syntax.

title: Add perfect forward secrecy
description: Implement PFS for network protocol. Rotate session keys frequently. Ensure past sessions remain secure if long-term keys compromised.

title: Add compliance reporting
description: Generate reports for SOC2, HIPAA, GDPR compliance

title: Implement NIST-compliant V3 format with proper nonce concatenation
description: Replace V2 XOR-based nonce construction with NIST SP 800-38D compliant concatenation (Fixed || Counter). Update to SCRYPTv3 magic bytes.

title: Add group policy support
description: Centralized policy distribution for organizations

title: Add hidden volume support
description: Plausible deniability with nested volumes

title: Implement multi-user collaboration
description: Support multiple users accessing same encrypted volume. Implement capability-based access control. Add conflict resolution for concurrent edits. Real-time sync.

title: Implement batch operations queue
description: Queue multiple files for processing

title: Implement CRYSTALS-Kyber key encapsulation
description:
Integrate ML-KEM-1024 (formerly CRYSTALS-Kyber) for post-quantum key encapsulation.

RESOLVED: Found workaround for rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2 API incompatibility

Updated findings (2025-11-21):
✓ Successfully updated argon2 to 0.6.0-rc.2 (uses rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2)
✓ Successfully updated rand to 0.10.0-rc.5 (uses rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2)  
✓ Updated forked crypto-common to use rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2
✓ All dependencies now aligned on rand_core 0.10.0-rc-2
✓ All 159 tests passing

SOLUTION FOUND:
Based on Stack Overflow (https://stackoverflow.com/q/79473286) and GitHub issue (https://github.com/rust-random/rand/issues/1561):

1. For SaltString generation:
   - Use OsRng.try_fill_bytes() to manually fill a byte array
   - Use SaltString::encode_b64() to create the salt string
   - This bypasses the CryptoRng trait requirement

2. For ML-KEM encapsulate() (requires CryptoRng):
   - Use OsRng.unwrap_err() which returns UnwrapErr<OsRng>
   - UnwrapErr<OsRng> implements CryptoRng trait
   - This provides panic-on-error semantics expected for OsRng

Changes applied:
- src/crypto/kdf.rs: Updated salt generation to use manual byte filling
- src/crypto/streaming.rs: Updated all test code to use try_fill_bytes()
- All compilation errors resolved
- All tests passing

Ready to proceed with ML-KEM integration using OsRng.unwrap_err() approach.

description: Pre-boot authentication and full disk encryption

description: Make interface more compact and intuitive like VeraCrypt

title: Design homomorphic encryption architecture
description: Design HE integration architecture. Define which operations support HE. Plan key management for HE schemes. Design encrypted search protocol.

description: Integrate hardware security devices (YubiKey, FIDO2, TPM 2.0, Intel SGX, AMD SEV, Smart Cards) for enterprise-grade key management and isolated execution.

title: Add compression support
description: Integrate Zstandard compression before encryption

title: Research and evaluate PQC algorithms
description: Research NIST PQC competition winners (CRYSTALS-Kyber, CRYSTALS-Dilithium, SPHINCS+). Evaluate Rust implementations (pqcrypto, oqs-sys). Document algorithm selection rationale.

description: Switch to egui or native-windows-gui for a proper native interface like VeraCrypt. No more npm/webpack bloat.

description: Document complete volume format specification: magic numbers, version, layout, header structure, key slots, encryption scheme. Essential for interoperability and auditing.

description: Integrate Intel Total Memory Encryption. Enable full memory encryption at hardware level. Add TME capability detection and configuration.

description: Create streaming file reader with configurable chunk size

description: Encrypt files chunk-by-chunk with progress tracking

description: Test network protocol security. Implement fuzzing for protocol parser. Add penetration testing suite. Verify E2E encryption correctness.

title: Design encrypted network protocol
description: Design custom network protocol for encrypted file sharing. Define packet format, authentication flow, encryption scheme. Use TLS 1.3 as transport layer.

title: Add PQC performance benchmarks
description: Benchmark Kyber KEM vs classical key exchange. Benchmark Dilithium signing/verification. Compare hybrid mode overhead. Document performance characteristics.

title: Design enterprise key management system
description: Central key escrow, recovery, and rotation

title: Implement FIDO2/WebAuthn authentication
description: Add passwordless authentication using FIDO2/WebAuthn. Support multiple authenticators. Implement attestation verification and resident keys.

title: Enhance TPM 2.0 key sealing
description: Extend existing TPM integration with advanced key sealing. Bind keys to PCR measurements. Support TPM-based authentication and sealed key storage.

description: Custom bootloader with pre-boot authentication

title: Design GUI mockups and UX flow
description: Create wireframes for main window, settings, progress

title: Add dummy traffic generation

title: Anti-Forensics Hardening Suite
description: Implement comprehensive anti-forensics protections: secure deletion, metadata sanitization, anti-cold-boot, anti-DMA, forensics tool detection, SSD wear-leveling awareness.

title: Update encrypt_file and decrypt_file to use streaming for memory efficiency
description: Replace in-memory encryption with ChunkedEncryptor/ChunkedDecryptor to handle large files efficiently. Maintain backward compatibility for v1 format decryption.

title: Add anti-DMA attack protection
description: Enable IOMMU/VT-d to prevent DMA attacks. Protect memory from FireWire/Thunderbolt attacks. Add DMA remapping for sensitive regions.

title: Add searchable encryption for filenames
description: Implement searchable symmetric encryption for file metadata. Support wildcard searches on encrypted filenames. Use deterministic or order-preserving encryption where appropriate.

title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Integration
description: Implement post-quantum cryptographic algorithms (CRYSTALS-Kyber, CRYSTALS-Dilithium) for future-proof encryption. Includes hybrid classical+PQC mode and migration tools for existing volumes.

description: Strip metadata from encrypted files (timestamps, author, EXIF). Randomize file sizes with padding. Clear filesystem metadata (journal, slack space).

title: Implement main window UI

description: Create example applications using HE. Write comprehensive HE documentation. Add tutorials for encrypted search and computation.

title: Implement server-side HE operations
description: Enable server to perform operations on encrypted data. Implement file deduplication on encrypted data. Add encrypted backup verification.

description: Extend GUI with volume creation wizard, mount/unmount controls, mounted volumes list, volume settings panel

title: Verify Argon2id implementation
description: Formally verify Argon2id key derivation. Prove: deterministic output for same inputs, no timing side-channels, memory bounds respected.

title: Implement encrypted FS operations

title: Add debugger detection

title: Implement CRYSTALS-Dilithium signatures
description: Integrate Dilithium for post-quantum digital signatures. Support Dilithium2, Dilithium3, Dilithium5 security levels. Add signing and verification for volume headers and audit logs.

description: Implement hybrid encryption using ML-KEM-1024 for key encapsulation combined with AES-256-GCM for data encryption. This provides quantum-resistant protection.

title: Add memory dump protection
description: Protect against memory dump attacks (hiberfil, crash dumps). Disable core dumps for sensitive processes. Clear keys before hibernation.

title: Create lib.rs library interface
description: Create public library API exposing core functionality

title: Document SSD secure deletion limitations
description: Document that multi-pass file overwriting (DoD, Gutmann) is ineffective on SSDs due to wear-leveling. Explain only options are: hardware secure erase, full-disk encryption from start, or physical destruction.

title: Add anti-cold-boot attack protection
description: Protect against RAM freezing attacks. Encrypt keys in RAM. Implement key splitting across memory regions. Add RAM overwrite on shutdown.

title: Create tamper-proof audit trails
description: Implement chain integrity verification. Add digital signatures per block. Enable third-party auditing without key access. Generate compliance reports.
